title: Atypi03: the news?
content:
unfortunately i wasn't there ... anyway, can anyone give me a quick news update? like what news fonts have been introduced and stuff like that?   
   
for example there's this on keith's site ...   
   
 [http://www.keithtamdesign.com/atypi03/atypi03-Pages/Image120.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123024/http:/www.keithtamdesign.com/atypi03/atypi03-Pages/Image120.html)   
   
who, where, when, why? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123024im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) thanks: lars
author: lars

comments.content: While waiting for news from individual conference attendees, why not check out the news section of the [ATypI website](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123024/http:/www.atypi.org/)?
